author: SkinnyTaste
name: Air Fryer Salmon Fish Sandwich

ingredients.notes: if frozen thawed, cut in 4 pieces

instructions: Combine the ingredients for the Lemon-Caper Mayo in a small bowl and refrigerate until ready to eat. Pat the salmon dry with a paper towel. Cut the fish into 4 pieces, about 4 x 4 inches. Season with 1/2 teaspoon salt. Place the egg whites in a shallow bowl. In a second shallow bowl combine the panko with remaining 1/2 teaspoon salt. Dip the fish into the egg whites, then the panko. Set aside. Spray the basket with oil. Lay the fish on the basket in a single layer, in batches as needed. Spray the tops of the fish with oil and air fry 400F 8 minutes, turning half way, until golden and crisp. Serve fish on buns with lettuce and divide the sauce.
